shows.title: Simulation Hypothesis / John Titor & Time Travel
shows.first_half: First Half: Scientist and researcher Doug Matzke will discuss consciousness, simulation hypothesis, and telepathy, as well as the cosmic infrastructure for the simulation hypothesis that may underly the universe.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Researcher Oliver Williams shares the story of John Titor, the alleged time traveler from 2036 who was said to arrive in our time in the early 2000s and spoke with multiple people online. Williams will bring to light the many predictions that Titor made that have come true, and the ones that did not.

shows.title: UFO Disclosure / Dream Meanings
shows.first_half: First Half: Advocate, researcher, and ufologist Daniel Sheehan will discuss the latest in the field of UFOs, as well as update how close we are to full disclosure.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and dream analyst Patricia Eltinge will present her research on dreaming, how to capture your dreams, what dream symbols mean, and the importance of understanding the meaning of our dreams. She'll expand on the idea that the freedoms afforded to us in the dream realm are unrestrained by our usual, everyday societal constraints, allowing us to experience profound and sometimes scary truths.

shows.title: Improving Sleep / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Health and wellness coach Pam Killeen joins Richard Syrett to discuss sleep habits and health strategies. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
